name: VIT - Med Care
desc: Ambulance booking service built for VIT and nearby areas using android and java

name: Heart Disease Prediction
desc: Predicting Heart Disease through 14 input parameters. Utilising Machine Learning and Deep learning methods

name: Telugu Text Summarisation
desc: Text summariser for telugu language using Bag of words , Tf-Idf and indic-NLP library. Front end integrated with Flask

name: Sentimental Analysis of Covid Vaccine Tweets
desc: Sentimental analysis of covid vaccine tweets using LSTM and RNN , external tweety api and real time data model.

desc: Loan management web app built in Java , Spring boot and AWS.

name: Library Managment System
desc: Library management web app built in Java , Spring boot and AWS

name: Community Quiz App
desc: Community Quiz app where people can sign up and build quizzes for others, while attempting others quizzes.
